## DocumentResource.getVisibilityInfo() method

Retrieves information about which recipients can view specific documents in a package during a Signing Ceremony.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getVisibilityInfo(packageId: string): Promise<DocumentVisibility>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[DocumentVisibility](./onespan-sign-node.documentvisibility.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Document visibility information
